definition: (virology) ultramicroscopic infectious agent that replicates itself only within cells of living hosts
details:
noun
- (virology) ultramicroscopic infectious agent that replicates itself only within cells of living hosts
- a software program capable of reproducing itself and usually capable of causing great harm to files or other programs on the same computer
= example: a software program capable of reproducing itself and usually capable of causing great harm to files or other programs on the same computer
= synonyms: computer virus
- a harmful or corrupting agency
= example: a harmful or corrupting agency
